attachments.title: 'Bait bikes' deployed at Reed College lead to arrest - BikePortland.org
attachments.text: Two local examples show that bait bikes have arrived in Portland.
attachments.fallback: BikePortland.org: 'Bait bikes' deployed at Reed College lead to arrest - BikePortland.org

text: inventing a cheap gps tracker that discreetly fits inside a handlebar or pedal would be a cool project
yes it would. a guy from my nextdoor feed is trying to start his own bike bait program <http://www.gofundme.com/fek2c4>
it mentions him in the article too i think
there's a startup I think in Israel that's making one <http://b45h.com/>

attachments.title: The Cricket
attachments.text: The 1st bicycle security device, bluetooth enabled, controlled from your iPhone.

text: or at least when I ordered it the package came from there...
I haven't installed it in my bike yet. i intended to use it for my touring bike, but now I have two bikes and i can't decide which would benefit more from it
the gofundme also mentions one from integratedtrackers as part of the budget... neato
yeah i hope he gets some traction. is the cricket as conspicuous in real life as it looks like it might be from the pictures?
it probably is? I was thinking of putting mine under my rear rack
